sent.orig: Hoped this article to deepen student assessment reform and the new curriculum reform has the enlightenment.
sent.trans: 希望本文对深化学生评价改革和新课程改革有所启示。

sent.orig: The rural reform has opened the prelude of China's reform and opening-up.
sent.trans: 农村改革揭开了中国改革开放的序幕。

sent.orig: Because our public finance system reform continuously thorough, treasury cash management reform increasingly urgent.
sent.trans: 随着我国财政体制改革的不断深入，国库现金管理改革日益紧迫。

sent.orig: Finally, there is the challenge of global reform, particularly reform of the global monetary system.
sent.trans: 最后，全球性改革也面临著挑战，尤其是全球货币体系改革。

sent.orig: Retirement pension system reform is one of the critical parts to china economic reform.
sent.trans: 建立新型的养老社会保障制度是我国整体经济改革的一个关键性的组成部分。
